src_original: caryāvikale 'pi ca bodhicitte nāvamanyatā karttavyā /  tasyāpy annantasaṃsārasukhaprasavanatvāt /
tgt_original: 菩提心所行，能壞輪迴苦。

src_original: yo 'py ayaṃ maitreya ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisatvānāṃ saṃbodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti /
tgt_original: 諸菩薩為菩提故，積集六波羅蜜多。 或有癡人作如是言：

src_original: prajñāpāramitāyām eva bodhisatvena śikṣitavyaṃ /  kiṃ śeṣābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ /
tgt_original: 般若波羅蜜多是菩薩學，云何復學餘波羅蜜多？

src_original: te 'nyāṃ pāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ manyante /
tgt_original: 或有聞已於方便等諸波羅蜜多起捨離意。

src_original: tat kiṃ manyase 'jita duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājābhūd yena kapotārthaṃ śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni /
tgt_original: 慈氏！ 於汝意云何？ 如迦尸王取自身肉而救於鴿，是王豈愚癡耶？

src_original: maitreya āha /
tgt_original: 慈氏白言：

src_original: yathāryamaitreyavimokṣe varṇitaṃ /
tgt_original: 如《彌勒解脫經》云：

src_original: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra cittam api vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati /  vajraratnanāma ca na vijahāti /  sarvadāridryaṃ vinivarttayati /
tgt_original: 善男子譬！ 如有人不取大金剛寶，別得一切金莊嚴具，而亦不捨大金剛寶，於貧窮者而能普濟。

src_original: evam eva kulaputrāśayapratipattibhinnam api sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati bodhisattvanāma ca na vijahāti /  sarvasaṃsāradāridryaṃ vinivarttayatīti /
tgt_original: 善男子！ 菩薩亦復如是，不取一切智心大金剛寶，別得一切聲聞緣覺功德金莊嚴具，而亦不捨彼菩薩行，所有一切輪迴貧窮者而能普濟。 菩薩能於一切種一切學平等而修，是為無量勝行。

src_original: yenāpararājāvavādakasūtre kathitaṃ /
tgt_original: 如《如來示教勝軍王經》云，佛言：

src_original: yasmāc ca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 大王！

src_original: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ /  evaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ /
tgt_original: 若汝所作多種事業，於一切種一切處，應共布施波羅蜜多乃至般若波羅蜜多相應而學。

src_original: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evam eva samyaksambodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ tra ... praṇidhiṃ ca gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi jāgrad api bhuñjāno 'pi /  pivann api /  satatasamitam anusmara /  manasikuru bhāvaya /
tgt_original: 是故大王！ 汝應如是，於正等覺起欲信求願趣向等心，若住若行、若臥若立、若飲若食、若諸所作，決定常時思念作意，觀想一切佛、菩薩、緣覺、聲聞。

src_original: sarvabuddhabodhisatvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakapṛthagj anānām ātmanaś cātītānāgatapratyutpannāni  sarvakuśalamūlāny abhisaṃkṣipya tulayitvā piṇḍayitvānumodasvāgrayā anumodanayā yāvad  ākāśasamatayā nirvāṇasamatayānumodasvānumodya ca sarvabuddhabodhisatvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ  niryātya ca sarvasatvasādhāraṇāni kuru /
tgt_original: 諸愚夫異生及己身等，所有過去未來現在一切善根合集一處，發勝上心，自當隨喜已，普於一切佛菩薩緣覺聲聞眾中供養承事所有功德，與一切眾生共之。

src_original: tataḥ sarvasatvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñātapratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine
tgt_original: 普願眾生乃至得一切智，一切佛法皆悉圓滿。

src_original: dine traikālyam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja
tgt_original: 若日日三時迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，大王！

src_original: tad evaṃ vyavasāyāśayau dṛḍhīkṛtya kāruṇyaṃ puraḥkṛtya yate śubhavṛddhaye //  yathoktam āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre /  atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat /
tgt_original: 如《聖法集經》云，爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩白佛言：

src_original: na bhagavan bodhisatvenātibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ /  eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisatvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ /  tasya sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 諸菩薩不應修學多種法門，但於一法而自勤行，即於一切法如掌中得。

src_original: katama ekadharmo /
tgt_original: 何等一法？

src_original: yad uta mahākaruṇā /
tgt_original: 所謂大悲。

src_original: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti /  evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇā yatroditā bhavati tatrānyabodhikarā dharmāḥ kriyāsu pracurā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 諸菩薩乘此大悲，即於一切佛法如掌中得。 世尊！

src_original: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhitānām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svasmin svasmin karaṇīye prācuryaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 而諸菩薩亦復如是，大悲行處，即能成就一切佛法力聚。 世尊！

src_original: tad yathā bhagavan jīvitendriye saty anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
tgt_original: 又如士夫命根堅固，即能令諸根而得轉故。

src_original: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavatīti //
tgt_original: 而諸菩薩亦復如是，大悲堅固，乃能令諸菩提行法而得轉故。

src_original: āryākṣayamatisūtre 'py āha //
tgt_original: 如《無盡意經》云：
